mapper.select: /* accbook.getAccbookList */ SELECT A.ACC_ID , A.USR_ID , A.CLASS_NM , A.ITEM_NM , DATE_FORMAT(A.ACC_YMD, '%Y-%m-%d') AS ACC_YMD , FORMAT(A.ACC_AMT, 0) AS ACC_AMT , A.ASSET_NM , A.NOTE FROM T_ACCBOOK A ORDER BY A.ACC_YMD DESC
/* accbook.getCommonCode */ SELECT A.CODE_TYPE_ID AS CODE , B.CODE_NM AS CODE_NM FROM T_CODE_TYPE A , T_CODE B WHERE A.CODE_TYPE_ID = B.CODE_TYPE_ID AND A.CODE_TYPE_ID = 'CLASS_CD'
